ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // {Tifa}
“What did your assistants find out?
Talk! If you don't tell us…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // Don Corneo
“…I made 'em find out where
the man with the gun-arm was.
But that's what I was ordered to do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // {Tifa}
“Talk! If you don't tell us…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:27}); // {Tifa}
“Did you say the Shinra!?
What are they up to!? Talk!”{PAUSE}“If you don't tell us…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:34}); // {Tifa}
“They're going to wipe
out the Sector 7 Slums!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:35}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}, will you come with
me to Sector 7?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Don Corneo
“…What the hell?
Who's there?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // “You're the ones from before!
Wh…what the hell's going on?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:62}); // Don Corneo
“Oh, yeah, yeah.
In Sector 7, in the slums.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:63}); // Don Corneo
“…and how do YOU
know that!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // “You're the ones from before!
Wh…what the hell's going on?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Don Corneo
“Come! Come!”{PAUSE}“Aoooooooh!!
I can't wait any longer!
Here comes Papa!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Tifa}
“Shut up,
we're asking the questions now…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // Don Corneo
“No--!
If I told you that, I'd be killed!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // Don Corneo
“Waaaaaaaaaaah--!
It was Heidegger of Shinra!”{PAUSE}“Heidegger, the head of
Peace Preservation!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:26}); // {Cloud}
“The head of Peace Preservation!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // Don Corneo
“You know what's going to happen?
The plate'll go PING”{PAUSE}“and everything's gonna go BAMMM!!
I heard their hideout's in
the Sector 7 Slums…”{PAUSE}“I'm just glad it's not here
in Sector 6.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // Don Corneo
“Just a second!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // Don Corneo
“Ahh, we're finally alone…”{PAUSE}“All right, pussycat…
Come to daddy!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // Don Corneo
“Woo-hoo!”{PAUSE}“Come, come, don't
be so shy…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Don Corneo
“Of course, my dear.
I'll take you through it slowly,
step by step. So come on!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // Don Corneo
“Hm? Oh, you mean about THAT?”{PAUSE}“Don't worry.
I'm single.
There, feel better now?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Don Corneo
“…What the hell?
Who's there?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // Don Corneo
“No! Not that!
I'll talk! I'll tell you everything!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // Don Corneo
“…You're serious, aren't you…
…ohboy, ohbooy, ohboy.”{PAUSE}“…I'm not fooling around
here either, you know.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // Don Corneo
“Shinra's trying to crush a
small rebel group called AVALANCHE,
and want to infiltrate their hideout.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Don Corneo
“And they're really going
to crush them…literally.”{PAUSE}“By breaking the supports
holding up the plate above them.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // Don Corneo
“Close, but no cigar!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:64}); // Don Corneo
“Woo-hoo!”{PAUSE}“Don't be shy.
We're all alone now…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:46}); // Don Corneo
“Oh man! I can't stand it!
All right, then…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // Don Corneo
“A man!?
What's goin' on?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // Don Corneo
“A man!?
You tricked me!!”{PAUSE}“Somebody get in here NOW!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:53}); // “Unfortunately,
no one'll be comin' to help.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:60}); // Don Corneo
“No way!”{PAUSE}“Hmm? {Barret}?
That sounds familiar…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // Don Corneo
“Why?
WHY? WHY?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:50}); // {Cloud}
“Because I'm gonna need
that mouth of yours to
give me some information!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:61}); // {Cloud}
“You know, he's one of the ones
you were trying to find out about.
You know, AVALANCHE…?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Aeris}
“Ye…yes…”{PAUSE}“But Mr. Don.
I'd like you to explain
something to me first…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Aeris}
“No, that's not what
I meant!”{PAUSE}“NO, STOP!
Just, just wait a second!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
“I know…”{PAUSE}“But you know, Don Corneo,
I'd like you to explain
something before we start…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
“No…I wasn't asking about that…”{PAUSE}“Wait a minute!
No, not yet!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Tifa}
“You still don't get it do you,
Don Corneo?”

dialogStrings: Corneo Hall,2f.

Don Corneo
“Woo-hoo!”{PAUSE}“Come, come, don't
be so shy…”

“Ye…yes…”{PAUSE}“But Mr. Don.
I'd like you to explain
something to me first…”

Don Corneo
“Of course, my dear.
I'll take you through it slowly,
step by step. So come on!”

{Aeris}
“No, that's not what
I meant!”{PAUSE}“NO, STOP!
Just, just wait a second!!”

Don Corneo
“Come! Come!”{PAUSE}“Aoooooooh!!
I can't wait any longer!
Here comes Papa!!”

“{Cloud}!!”

{Tifa}
“I know…”{PAUSE}“But you know, Don Corneo,
I'd like you to explain
something before we start…”

Don Corneo
“Hm? Oh, you mean about THAT?”{PAUSE}“Don't worry.
I'm single.
There, feel better now?”

{Tifa}
“No…I wasn't asking about that…”{PAUSE}“Wait a minute!
No, not yet!!”

“{Cloud}!!”

Don Corneo
“…What the hell?
Who's there?”

{Aeris}
“I'm sorry,
Don.”

{Tifa}
“You still don't get it do you,
Don Corneo?”

Don Corneo
“What?”

{Tifa}
“Shut up,
we're asking the questions now…”

{Tifa}
“What did your assistants find out?
Talk! If you don't tell us…”

{Cloud}
“…I'll chop it off.”

Don Corneo
“No! Not that!
I'll talk! I'll tell you everything!”

“So…talk.”

Don Corneo
“…I made 'em find out where
the man with the gun-arm was.
But that's what I was ordered to do.”

{Tifa}
“By whom?”

Don Corneo
“No--!
If I told you that, I'd be killed!”

{Tifa}
“Talk! If you don't tell us…”

{Aeris}
“…I'll rip it off.”

Don Corneo
“Waaaaaaaaaaah--!
It was Heidegger of Shinra!”{PAUSE}“Heidegger, the head of
Peace Preservation!”

{Cloud}
“The head of Peace Preservation!?”

{Tifa}
“Did you say the Shinra!?
What are they up to!? Talk!”{PAUSE}“If you don't tell us…”

{Tifa}
“…I'll smash it.”

Don Corneo
“…You're serious, aren't you…
…ohboy, ohbooy, ohboy.”{PAUSE}“…I'm not fooling around
here either, you know.”

Don Corneo
“Shinra's trying to crush a
small rebel group called AVALANCHE,
and want to infiltrate their hideout.”

Don Corneo
“And they're really going
to crush them…literally.”{PAUSE}“By breaking the supports
holding up the plate above them.”

“Break the supports!?”

Don Corneo
“You know what's going to happen?
The plate'll go PING”{PAUSE}“and everything's gonna go BAMMM!!
I heard their hideout's in

“They're going to wipe
out the Sector 7 Slums!?”

{Cloud}
“Of course,
{Tifa}.”

Don Corneo
“Just a second!”

{Cloud}
“Shut up!”

Don Corneo
“No wait, it'll only take a second.”{PAUSE}“Why do you think scum like me
babbled on about the truth?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Because I've given up on life
{CHOICE}Because I'm sure I'll win
{CHOICE}Because I'm clueless

Don Corneo
“Buuzzzzz! Wrong!”

Don Corneo
“Woo-hoo! Right!”

Don Corneo
“Close, but no cigar!”

Don Corneo
“Ahh, we're finally alone…”{PAUSE}“All right, pussycat…
Come to daddy!!”

Don Corneo
“You're so cute, I never
get tired of looking at you.”{PAUSE}“Do you…like me, too?”
{CHOICE}Of course!
{CHOICE}Umm…

Don Corneo
“You sure do know how to make a guy
feel good!”{PAUSE}“Then, wh…what do you want to DO?”
{CHOICE}Whatever YOU want, daddy
{CHOICE}I don't care…

Don Corneo
“Oh man! I can't stand it!
All right, then…”

“Give me a kiss!! A KISS!!”
{CHOICE}All right…
{CHOICE}Nope, can't do that…

WHY? WHY?”

{Cloud}
“Because I'm gonna need
that mouth of yours to
give me some information!!”

You tricked me!!”{PAUSE}“Somebody get in here NOW!!”

“Unfortunately,
no one'll be comin' to help.”

“You're the ones from before!
Wh…what the hell's going on?”
“Ju---st a minute!!”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…”{PAUSE}“Were you really…?”
“Information? What information?”
“Th…then why?”

Don Corneo
“You don't like me?”{PAUSE}“There…there isn't someone else, is there?”
{CHOICE}No, only you
{CHOICE}Yes, his name's {Barret}…

That sounds familiar…”
